channel.title: How do i add npcs
channel.description: I need help adding npcs. I can add them with ::npc (id) but when i logg out they never stay. Please help.

item.title: How do i add npcs
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[code]lolz ok open autospawn and add this

spawn = 2745	2375	5068	0	3104	5068	3104	5068	1	Jad

ok ill explain the numbers after spawn is the npc id the next 2 ‘sets’ of numbers

spawn = 2745 2375 5068 0 3104 5068 3104 5068 1 Jad

is the coords where he/she will stand

the next 1 keep as 0, then the other 4 ‘sets’ of numbers is where you want him to walk x y x y keep the last number 1 and change jad to your npc name[/code]

Read full topic
